@jacobdbland We look forward to having you as a customer! 😎 - GM
@NAlestock Hi Nicole! I'm sorry to hear about your delays! If you need assistance, please send us a direct message with your details. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - GM
@therbst43 Hi Tom! When and how frequently flights will continue to operate on that route beyond August 2021, still remains to be determined at this time. - C

@sc4306 Thanks for the love! Part of the way we're able to keep our fares so low is by itemizing each part of your ticket so that you can choose what you do and do not want to pay for. As opposed to including a bag or other items you may not want or need in your ticket price. - C

@RHoverman You're most welcome, Rachel! We understand that the decision to fly is a personal one that involves many factors right now, but we'll be excited to welcome you back on board when the time is right for you! - SG

entity.name: Sesame Street
entity.description: A longtime favorite of children and adults, and a staple of PBS, "Sesame Street" bridges many cultural and educational gaps with a fun program. Big Bird leads a cast of characters teaching children numbers, colors and the alphabet. Bert and Ernie, Oscar the Grouch and Grover are just a few of the other creatures involved in this show, set on a city street full of valuable learning opportunities.

@meep1972 We are so sorry to hear that you are experiencing a disruption in your service with us. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to help you in any way they can. - C

@paytonl41225638 Hi Payton! Today's flight 2128 with service from LEX to SFB was rescheduled for tomorrow due to Air Traffic Control disruptions outside of Allegiant's control. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM. - C

@KaehrMimi Hi there! We're sorry to hear about this. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the specifics of your request and a member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C
@mommagolfer We'll certainly pass along your feedback to our team! Thanks so much, Mary! - SG

@oohaw94 Hello Scott! We are so sorry to hear that your flight was cancelled. Unfortunately, daily operational challenges and weather sometimes interfere with our schedules, with little notice. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C

@moonburned1 Hello Jen! We are sorry to hear that you had a less than enjoyable experience on your flight with us. We thank you for bringing this matter to our attention so that we may investigate and make any necessary corrections. - C
@Jakevskurwas It would not be able to be carried on, it must be checked in, inside of a bag. - Lupe
@Jakevskurwas Hi Jake! For safety reasons, the skateboard must be inside of a bag. -Lupe
@summer_lynn7 Your feedback will help us determine how we can best meet our customers’ needs. - Lupe

@summer_lynn7 Flight exceeds 65 percent capacity by following the link on your email confirmation. We thank you for sharing your experience with us, as we are constantly evaluating our policies and procedures and adjusting them when necessary.

@summer_lynn7 Reseat passengers so that social distancing can be observed. However, on fuller flights, this may not always be possible. In the future, you are welcome to sign up to be notified via email if your

@summer_lynn7 Hi Summer! We are very sorry to learn of the uncomfortable experience you had on this flight, as it is never our intention to cause discomfort during travel. Please know, if the flight capacity allows, flight attendants will
@tumilavender Hi there! If you still need assistance, please send us a DM. - Lupe

@KilRN4L Hi there! If you are in need of assistance or have questions regarding your flight(s) with us, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C

@mol6652 Hi there! If your flight was cancelled by Allegiant, you have the option to change to any other available Allegiant flight at no additional cost. If you're in need of assistance, plz send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP - C

@deblstein Hi Debbie! Thanks for reaching out. If you have a reservation with us and are seeking information or options pertaining to that reservation, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details and the specifics as to how we can help you. - C
@itsjustCat_ We are sorry to hear this. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM. - C

@nearlyangels Due to the current circumstances, we are currently boarding our flights by row from back to front, whenever possible. If you would like a specific seat, we offer the option to purchase a seat selection for a nominal fee. If you have additional questions, please send us a DM. - C

@danielnelson91 Hi Daniel! Thanks for contacting Allegiant. We are sorry to hear that you seat was changed. Please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details so that we can look into this for you. - C

@C_Allen44 Hi there Charlie! We're sorry to hear of your frustration. Our ticket counters will open to accept checked bags two hours prior to your estimated time of departure, but not before then. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. - C

@JordanFalls Unfortunately, we do not. You can learn more about our face covering policy at https://t.co/QiKaDApBb0, or feel free to send us a private message if you have any additional questions. - SG
@Softball12317 I'm sincerely sorry to hear that your flight has been delayed. Please feel free to send us a private message if you have any additional questions. - SG

@b_launders Hi Billy! If you have a reservation with us and you  have questions regarding a flight on that reservation, please feel free to send us a DM with your reservation information and the specifics of your inquiry. A member of our team will gladly help you ASAP. - C

@positive_ashley All of our team members are expected to be professional, respectful, and assist however they can. We're saddened to learn that the service you received did not meet your expectations. If you wish to discuss this in greater detail w/ a member of our team, plz send us a DM. - C
@dglass2 Hi Daniel! We're tirelessly working to improve our customer experience and we will continue to do so with the help of passengers just like you. Thanks for sharing this feedback with us. - C

data.text: @papadanf Credit vouchers can be applied online as a form of payment at check out. Look for a drop-down menu labeled ’Do you have an Allegiant Voucher or Promo Code?’ on the payment page. Enter your voucher number and click ‘Apply Voucher.’ Plz send us a DM if you have other questions. - C

@NicoleW77000796 I'm sorry to hear about your frustrations, Nicole. If you need any further assistance, please feel free to send us a private message and someone from our team will be happy to help! - SG
